result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.orig: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ċuala mé m'aṫair ag scéalaíoċt ortI often heard my father talking about you.
